powerconsumption: Max. 5.5 W (Max. 7.5 W with IR cut filter on)
imagesettings: Rotate mode, Saturation, Brightness, Contrast adjustable by client software or web browser
daynight: IR cut filter with auto switch
minillumination: 0.07Lux @ (F1.2, AGC ON) ,0 Lux with IR 0.1Lux @(F2.0, AGC ON),0 Lux with IR
alarm: Motion detection, Dynamic Analysis, Tampering alarm, Network disconnect, IP address conflict, Storage exception
security: User Authentication, Watermark, IP address filtering, anonymous access
imagesensor: 3 Megapixel CMOS ICR Infrared Network Mini Bullet Camera 1/3" Progressive Scan CMOS
